mapper.select: select count(1) from XT_SSJJYSB a,XT_SSJJY b,XT_BSYSB c where c.id=a.sbid and b.id=a.ssjjyid and c.sbzt='1' and b.ssid=#{ssid}
select a.id,b.xm from XT_SSJJY a, XT_JJRY b where b.zt=1 and a.ryid=b.id and a.ssid=#{ssid}
SELECT c.sbbh,a.* from XT_SSJJYSB a,XT_SSJJY b,XT_BSYSB c where c.id=a.sbid and b.id=a.ssjjyid and c.sbzt='1' and b.ssid=#{ssid}
SELECT count(1) from XT_SSJJY where ssid = #{ssid} and zt='1' and ( zb = '' or zb is null )

SELECT dm.dmmc as sblx, bssb.sbbh, ry.xm, ry.dh FROM XT_SSJJYSB sb left join XT_SSJJY jj on jj.id = sb.ssjjyid and jj.zt = '1' left join XT_JJRY ry on jj.ryid = ry.id and ry.zt = '1' left join XT_BSYSB bssb on bssb.id = sb.sbid and bssb.sbzt = '1' left join XT_GYDM dm on dm.id = bssb.sblx and dm.lbid = '2' where jj.ssid = #{ssid} and sb.zt = '1' order by sb.ssjjyid asc limit ${startPage}, ${page}
